Package it.unicam.cs.pa.jbudget105101.model

Interface CashBox

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Box, DebitBox, LoadBox, SaveBox, Wallet
    public interface CashBox

    The classes that will implement CashBox will have the responsibility to implement what will later be "money boxes". The purpose of these boxes will be to keep track of the various transactions that can be added to them.

    The method getGoal()is optional. Classes that will implement this interface are not required to implement this functionality. In this case the method will have to throw the UnsupportedOperationException.

    Version:
    3.5 (06-06-2020)
    Author:
    Damiano Cacchiarelli - damiano.cacchiarelli@studenti.unicam.it

        This method allows you to add a transaction to the Box.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • updateBalance
